ResourceHeader.Description: A comprehensive list of chain of cause-effect of solar eruptive events from Sun to Earth. In this study, the tracking is carried out backward from the Earth to the Sun, starting from ICMEs observed at in-situ.

Parameter.Name: Event ID/Date
Parameter.Description: An event id to each ICME event as YYMMDD.

Parameter.Name: ICME Disturb/Shock Start
Parameter.Description: Start time of ICME event, from Richardson/Cane ICME list.

Parameter.Name: ICME Ejecta Start
Parameter.Description: Start time of ICME ejecta (EJ)/ Magnetic Cloud (MC), from Richardson/Cane ICME list.

Parameter.Name: ICME Disturb End
Parameter.Description: End time of ICME event, from Richardson/Cane ICME list.

Parameter.Name: Shock
Parameter.Description: Association with interplanetary shock, time of shock is from ipshocks database. * time of shock is from CfA Interplanetary Shock.

Parameter.Name: ICME Type
Parameter.Description: Denotes whether the ICME event is associated with the Shock (SK), Sheath (SH), and Ejecta (EJ) or Magnetic Cloud (MC).

Parameter.Name: CME Start LASCO
Parameter.Description: First appearance of CME (associated with ICME event) in LASCO's field of view, from CDAW Catalog.

Parameter.Name: CME Velocity CDAW (Km/s)
Parameter.Description: Velocity of fitted CME, from CDAW Catalog

Parameter.Name: NOAA AR
Parameter.Description: Associated solar active region (AR). 'NAR' (Not from AR) if it is not associated with an AR.

Parameter.Name: Surface Location
Parameter.Description: Heliographic location of solar eruption (associated with ICME event)

Parameter.Name: Flare Class
Parameter.Description: GOES X-ray class of the associated flare or eruption (if not associated with any major flare).

Parameter.Name: Flare Onset
Parameter.Description: Beginning time of associated flare or eruption if it is not associated with any major flare.

Parameter.Name: Filament
Parameter.Description: 'Yes' if the eruption is associated with a filament outside of an AR. 'NA' if the eruption is from AR.

Parameter.Name: Wave Dimming Arcade (WDA)
Parameter.Description: 'Yes' if the eruption is from an AR and dimming is observed in EUV data. 'NA' if it is associated with filament eruption.

Parameter.Name: DST Peak (nT)
Parameter.Description: The lowest value of the DST index

Parameter.Name: Catalog Cited
Parameter.Description: 'R' is for Richardson/Cane ICME list, 'W' is for ICME list from Wind, 'U' is for ICME list by USTC, and 'H' is for ICME list by HELCATS.

Parameter.Name: Quality ICME
Parameter.Description: This denotes the quality of the event's signature in-situ, 1 is the best and 3 is the worst.

Parameter.Name: Quality CME
Parameter.Description: This denotes the quality of the identified CME, 1 is the best and 3 is the worst.

Parameter.Name: Quality SSS
Parameter.Description: This denotes the quality of the solar surface source (SSS) region, 1 is the best and 3 is the worst.

Parameter.Name: Quality All
Parameter.Description: This denotes the overall quality of the ICME event (from the Sun to the Earth), 1 is the best and 3 is the worst.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind Plots
Parameter.Description: Plots showing essential in-situ parameters from WIND and ACE.

Parameter.Name: Links for CME & SSS Data
Parameter.Description: ISWA Data: Space weather analysis products from iSWA. CME SSS Data: CME and solar source surface data for selected events.

Parameter.Name: Event Log
Parameter.Description: Extensive report on selected ICME events.
